name: Anchored animations
description:
Learn to animate with creating anchors.

Learn how to create rotation anchors, as for example, when you want to rotate an arm, but by its shoulder axis.

In this work file you'll learn how i do it, and test it in action as a prototype.

I would like to know what you feel about this file, and if i can do improvements or would like to learn more.

https://twitter.com/stievehansen
